The correct timeline is: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6
Option A best fits the sequence of events as it starts with the oldest event mentioned, which is the 1949 Science paper, followed by the current events such as the seal dating and the Carbon-14 test performed on the dinosaur bone.

The correct timeline is: 1) The title card appears, introducing the topic of the video. 2) Forest and aquarium scenes play, providing background context. 3) A woman in a blue blazer makes a statement about the dating results. 4) An Antarctica map is displayed, explaining its relevance to the topic. 5) A man at a desk explains the concept of carbon dating and its limitations. 6) A young man expresses skepticism about dating methods and mentions an article he found.

Therefore, the answer is C: 1 -> 3 -> 2 -> 4 -> 6 -> 5.
